text: [Tamen] dui nimen [wei an la zhi dao juanzhu] shi linse de. Dang kongju jianglin [tamen] shi, ni jiang kanjian tamen wangzhe ni, tamen de yanjing zhuandong de haoxiang chuyu siwang bianyuan de ren yiyang. Dang kongju [cong tamen] xiaoshi shi, tamen bian yi jianke dehua lai gongji nimen, tamen [dui wei an la zhi dao shishe qiancai] shi linse de. Zhexie ren bing wei xinyang, suoyi, an la yi shi tamen de shangong tulao, zhe dui an la shi rongyi de.
